column4: hello all, i have a vanilla ubuntu 10.04. to connect to the internet i have to use the cisco auth which uses https and login. i'm using firefox but even though i can ping the gw and resolve it idles forever trying to reach the auth page. maybe https is not supported, on win it works fine, what can it be? note the network works fine
try google chrome and see if that works
it reads closer to Internet explorer than firefox
that's a problem since i can't connect using ubuntu
